text:
Many say that this is the place to stay to watch the Formula 1 in October with fabulous views of the racetrack below but my visit in May was luxuriously quieter, and more appealing. The staff are attentive, friendly and extremely helpful in looking after all of your needs, especially when attending the vast and delicious  breakfast buffet which accommodates all eating idiosyncrasies. The rooms are extremely modern and spacious with fabulous views.
Highly recommended!

If you want real luxury i would suggest the go to this hotel . Every night at 6 you would go to the top of the building to the restraint only for the most expensive rooms and it would be cocktail time . You can have as many cocktails as you wanted in the evening . Sohan and I were tipsy every night . It was great . We really had a great time. The service was outstanding . All the staff   were lovely and made friends with us and would get us anything we wanted . They all treated us like we were royalty. We felt very at home their .. We stayed in the studio room level 34 . The food was great .  Their is enough entertainment  in the Hotel . It's a 5 STAR . I do recommend  going their.
Pan Pacific was awesome! The room was super comfy with a killer view, and the staff made check-in a breeze. Loved hanging by the pool and grabbing a tasty breakfast. Would definitely go back again!
the lobby and the elevator design is wonderful and entertaining. The daily housekeeping is also very nice! However the room itself might need a renovation a bit old and dirty.

We came to this hotel with high expectations and were not disappointed. Very well appointed and modern. The hotel staff are just wonderful & aim to please. To top it off, the hotel is connected to Marina Square mall!
